statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.name: rebounds
statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.name: defensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.

statistics.name: offensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the offense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot.

article.description: Comer's hot hand leads FGCU past Lipscomb 75-62
article.headline: Comer's hot hand leads FGCU past Lipscomb 75-62
article.linkText: Comer's hot hand leads FGCU past Lipscomb 75-62
article.story: FORT MYERS, Fla. -- Brett Comer scored 10 points as Florida Gulf Coast powered away from halftime on a 15-5 clip to defeat Lipscomb 75-62 on Wednesday. The scoring burst in the first 4 minutes of the second half boosted Comer to 24 points, matching his career best, before he sat out the final 10:41 with four fouls. The Eagles (8-7, 2-0 Atlantic Sun) started conference play 2-0 for the first time. Bernard Thompson and DaJuan Graf each added 13 points for FGCU, a career high for Graf. Twins Martin and Malcolm Smith led Lipscomb (5-8, 0-2) with 20 and 15 points, respectively. The Bisons were outrebounded 41-31 but were not effective from 3-point range, hitting just 9 of 25 -- 3 for 10 after halftime. J.C. Hampton hit 4 of 7 3-pointers for 14 points. On FCGU's first possession, Comer found Bernard Thompson on the wing for 3-pointer to collect his 500th career assist.
